original_text: Yea, he magnified himself even to the prince of the host, and by him the daily sacrifice was taken away, and the place of the sanctuary was cast down.
korean_text: 또 스스로 높아져서 군대의 주재를 대적하며 그에게 매일 드리는 제사를 없애 버렸고 그의 성소를 헐었으며

sentences.original_text: even to the prince of the host
and by him the daily sacrifice was taken away
and the place of the sanctuary was cast down
